member.summary: The size of each cell in the Grid.

member.summary: The size of the gap between each cell in the Grid.

member.summary: The layout of the cells in the Grid.

member.summary: The cell swizzle for the Grid.

member.exception: Thrown when the grid is null or invalid.

member.summary: Returns the local bounds for a cell at the location.
member.returns: Local bounds of cell at the location.

member.summary: Returns the local bounds for the groups of cells at the location.
member.param: Origin of the group of cells.
Size of the group of cells.
member.returns: Local bounds of the group of cells at the location.

member.name: M:PrivateAPIBridge.UnsafeGridHandle.CellToLocal(UnityEngine.Vector3Int)
member.summary: Converts a cell position to local position space.
member.returns: Local position of the cell position.

member.name: M:PrivateAPIBridge.UnsafeGridHandle.LocalToCell(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Converts a local position to cell position.
member.returns: Cell position of the local position.

member.name: M:PrivateAPIBridge.UnsafeGridHandle.CellToLocalInterpolated(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Converts an interpolated cell position in floats to local position space.

member.name: M:PrivateAPIBridge.UnsafeGridHandle.LocalToCellInterpolated(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Converts a local position to interpolated cell position.

member.name: M:PrivateAPIBridge.UnsafeGridHandle.CellToWorld(UnityEngine.Vector3Int)
member.summary: Converts a cell position to world position space.
member.returns: World position of the cell position.

member.name: M:PrivateAPIBridge.UnsafeGridHandle.LocalToWorld(UnityEngine.Vector3)

member.name: M:PrivateAPIBridge.UnsafeGridHandle.WorldToLocal(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Converts a world position to local position.

member.summary: Get the logical center coordinate of a grid cell in local space.
